post.body: @fagunbhavsar laaya hon bapu. Ran maan khilyu gulab...
Bapu tame kutchi cho? to to tamaro timber no j dhandho hashe ne? :-)
Same cycle is being repeated. We provided same list after parliament attack, that time they demanded L.K. Advani.
Now that you are on notice period, why don't you make one? I promise, I'll join :-)
Why of course @dhempe
No no, don't listen to him. He is evil. This is good name :P
Relax! There isn't going to be as much as a battle, forget the nuclear war. BELIEVE ME on this.
Woah! Now THAT's more like it...
I still think @DiChak was a better choice! :P
So decided to change your twitter handle under immense public pressure, huh?
CARDIGANS : A statement, only if you are Roger Federer.
It's just that I've seen people report straight faced or getting 'Barkha' . Yours was too good..
no no, I didn't mean notes. I meant this non-neutral approach.
For once, I feel that you are taking non-journalistic approach to this. I, for one, am not complaining. Twitter effect, may be
Nope, how is it?
You'd have to enable 'Keyboard shortcuts' feature from labs for that.
Take Ferrari,McLaren,Renault,BMW for four. What's left any way??
Mine would NYTimes. Do you know they hand-code their CSS to avoid misrendering?
Good for you!
I think tomorrow is full-moon day.
That's because they changed APIs of logging in!
Agreed. He is getting beaten quite often, but hanging in there all the same.
It was in reference to your twitter about how someone can follow 1000 people in 2 hours.
Oh in US, I see. Didn't know that...Enjoy!
You are WATCHING the match live? Damn you...
All the best. IMHO, Quality has immensely dropped since mid season 3 and especially 4 in HIMYM.
'Tiger' is awake, is he? What about his coward cub?
I am as cynical as you are. I have not exorcised my earlier Chennai ghosts yet!
It very much is possible. Twitter APIs are very simple!
Totally agree. In fact the whole ad is amazing...
I agree on insanity of new rules with you. but FIA is facing lot of pressure from all around the world.
Somehow or the other, why do you always sound so pissed? chill...
The genre is called feminist-version-of-dead-poets-society . I know it's little long, but 100% true. I swear :)
You may be right, but he has brought this upon himself. He deserves all the criticism he is on receiving end for.
Twitter is cleaning up so many bots these days, hence the sudden drop mainly. but yeah I got your point :)
So much for chokers. A little early to say, but SA are on the way to pulling off second highest chase.
everybody in your area seems to be fan of Chipotle!
@fagunbhavsar I am not going anywhere! I was just telling baapu that he'd have to leave early...
Reaching at 7 am. Aaje raatre j ghare thee nikalvu padshe airport java :-)

"Dil Kabaddi" is frame-by-frame copy of Woody Allen's "Husbands and Wives". #FAIL Irrfan was awesome though...
Time to clean up the tail before Prior gets chance to do some heroics! #cricket

Woah! Mishra nails Flintoff early in the morning...
Kiefer Sutherland gets his star on Hollywood Walk of Fame... yay!!
Herewith, I pronounce Rediff as NSFW website.
If I've to use internet on my mobile, I'll have to shell out atleast Rs. 99/- pm now. RCom sucks!
Since when did Kingfisher Red (Deccan) start serving breakfast??!! It's meant to be no-frills, no?
That's 1000 runs for Tendulkar in the calendar year. Keep going Tendlya!
Although run-rate requirement is not too high, THE key is to rotate strike right now. Not to let any bowler settle.
50 for Tendulkar! But this is just the beginning, if India are to win this match.
There goes Laxman... bad baD bAD BAD!!!
82 runs, 2 wickets. Slightly English tilted session, I'd say. India lost a wicket too many. Crucial session coming up.
There goes Gambhir... Fingers crossed! Sachin, Laxman, Yuvraj, Dhoni, time to play innings of your LIFE!
Seriously, what the hell? One day I buy a put and market booms for no reason... FAIL!
Damn the high-speed broadband!! Completed 90210 season 1 (so far) TODAY.
What am I watching these days? 90210. Who the hell is giggling??
Apparently Irrfan Khan is doing 5-6 movies next year, not that I am complaining....

Having get used to @TweetMAT, I am using twitter web interface after a looong time. Feels different.
Last minute field changes help Dhoni remove Flintoff too. Lead still 171. Can India do something about it tomorrow?
Kevin Pietersen hits *that* switch hit! WOW!
